1110000011100110 0111110011001111 1 -> sum: 0101110110110110, cout: 1
1101011000000000 0011110100110001 1 -> sum: 0001001100110010, cout: 1
1011111100000111 0000010010001111 0 -> sum: 1100001110010110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
